publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3831 Nigel Don: Wyeth Research Protein Therapeutics Laboratory—That the Parliament welcomes the official opening of the Wyeth Research Protein Therapeutics Laboratory in Aberdeen by the First Minister on Tuesday 17 March 2009; notes the groundbreaking research being carried out by Wyeth using protein from sharks to investigate therapies for a number of illnesses, including cancer and Alzheimer’s disease; considers that this further cements Scotland’s reputation as a world leader in life sciences, and hopes that the work of Wyeth and other life science companies will promise hope in finding therapies for such illnesses as cancer, Alzheimer’s disease and rheumatoid arthritis.
S3M-3831 Wyeth Research Protein Therapeutics Laboratory (lodged on 30 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3831 Wyeth Research Protein Therapeutics Laboratory (lodged on 30 March 2009) Brian Adam*, Rob Gibson*, Sandra White*, Kenneth Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Hugh Henry*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*

S3M-3831 Nigel Don: Wyeth Research Protein Therapeutics Laboratory—That the Parliament welcomes the official opening of the Wyeth Research Protein Therapeutics Laboratory in Aberdeen by the First Minister on Tuesday 17 March 2009; notes the groundbreaking research being carried out by Wyeth using protein from sharks to investigate therapies for a number of illnesses, including cancer and Alzheimer’s disease; considers that this further cements Scotland’s reputation as a world leader in life sciences, and hopes that the work of Wyeth and other life science companies will promise hope in finding therapies for such illnesses as cancer, Alzheimer’s disease and rheumatoid arthritis. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Brian Adam, Rob Gibson, Sandra White, Kenneth Gibson, Robin Harper, Hugh Henry, Stuart McMillan, Bill Kidd, Maureen Watt*
S3M-3831 Wyeth Research Protein Therapeutics Laboratory (lodged on 30 March 2009) Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-3831 Wyeth Research Protein Therapeutics Laboratory (lodged on 30 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3831 Wyeth Research Protein Therapeutics Laboratory (lodged on 30 March 2009) Mary Scanlon*
S3M-3831 Wyeth Research Protein Therapeutics Laboratory (lodged on 30 March 2009) Alison McInnes*
